description.narrative: Founded on the west bank of the Nile River at the base of the sacred mountain Jebel Barkal in the 15th century BC, the ancient Nubian city of Nepata remained an important cult center for the worship of Amon through a succession of dynasties, kingdoms, and empires through the 1st century AD. This project involves the conservation of the sites surviving tombs and other structures.
